components: Order Processing Backend (Console App with MSMQ)

critical: Convert all projects from .NET Framework 4.8.1 to .NET 10
Migrate ASP.NET MVC 5 to ASP.NET Core MVC or Minimal APIs
Replace WCF service with gRPC, REST API, or in-process library
Replace MSMQ with Azure Service Bus or Azure Storage Queue
Containerize all applications for Azure Container Apps
Replace System.Web dependencies with ASP.NET Core equivalents
Migrate from packages.config to PackageReference format
important: Replace in-memory data with persistent storage (Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, etc.)
Implement health checks for container orchestration
Configure for cloud deployment (app settings, connection strings)
Add OpenTelemetry or Application Insights instrumentation
optional: Modernize UI with Razor Pages or Blazor
Implement rate limiting and resilience patterns
Add comprehensive unit and integration tests

project_structure.notes: Three separate projects need migration; legacy .csproj format

framework_migration.notes: Major framework shift from .NET Framework to .NET 10; ASP.NET MVC to ASP.NET Core

wcf_migration.notes: WCF service needs complete replacement; no direct equivalent in .NET Core/10

msmq_replacement.notes: MSMQ not available in containers; requires Azure Service Bus or alternatives

containerization.notes: Standard containerization; requires Dockerfile creation and configuration

code_complexity.notes: Business logic is straightforward; minimal complex dependencies

risk_factors: MSMQ to Azure Service Bus migration requires code and infrastructure changes
WCF client/service replacement affects communication layer
Session state management needs rearchitecting for cloud deployment
No existing tests to validate migration correctness
In-memory data will be lost on container restarts

phases.name: Replace WCF Service
tasks: Convert ProductServiceLibrary to a class library or REST API
Update ProductCatalog to use direct library reference or HTTP client

phases.name: Migrate Web Application
tasks: Convert ASP.NET MVC 5 to ASP.NET Core MVC
Replace session state with distributed cache or cookies

phases.name: Replace MSMQ with Azure Service Bus
tasks: Set up Azure Service Bus queue
Update order submission logic in web app
Update order processing logic in OrderProcessor

phases.name: Containerization
tasks: Configure for container environment (ports, env vars)

phases.name: Azure Container Apps Deployment
tasks: Configure container apps for each service
Set up Azure Service Bus connection strings

prerequisites: Azure Container Registry for container images
Docker Desktop for local container testing

breaking_changes.change: System.Web namespace not available in .NET Core/10
breaking_changes.mitigation: Replace with ASP.NET Core equivalents (HttpContext, IHttpContextAccessor)
Replace with gRPC, REST API, or direct library reference

breaking_changes.change: System.Messaging not available in .NET Core/10 and not container-compatible
breaking_changes.mitigation: Replace with Azure Service Bus, RabbitMQ, or Azure Storage Queues

breaking_changes.change: In-process session state not recommended for cloud/container deployment
breaking_changes.mitigation: Use distributed cache (Redis), cookies, or stateless design

breaking_changes.change: Web.config and App.config replaced with appsettings.json
breaking_changes.mitigation: Migrate configuration to appsettings.json and environment variables

breaking_changes.change: In-memory data not persistent in containers
breaking_changes.mitigation: Implement persistent storage (Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, etc.)

opportunities: Modernize to cloud-native architecture with better scalability
Implement modern DevOps practices with containers
Leverage Azure managed services for messaging and data
Improve performance with async/await patterns throughout
Implement modern authentication with Azure AD
Enable horizontal scaling with stateless design

immediate_actions: Create development branch for modernization work
Provision Azure resources (Container Apps, Service Bus)
Document current application behavior for testing
success_criteria: Successfully deployed to Azure Container Apps
Order processing working with Azure Service Bus
Containers start and respond to health checks
Basic monitoring and logging in place
post_migration: Optimize container images for size and startup time
